00011 #ifndef __gtx_transpose_inl__
00012 #define __gtx_transpose_inl__
00013 
00014 #include "gtx_transpose.h"
00015 
00016 namespace glm
00017 {
00018     template <typename T>
00019     inline _xmat2<T> transposeGTX(const _xmat2<T>& m)
00020     {
00021         _xmat2<T> Transpose;
00022         Transpose[0][0] = m[0][0];
00023         Transpose[0][1] = m[1][0];
00024         Transpose[1][0] = m[0][1];
00025         Transpose[1][1] = m[1][1];
00026         return Transpose;
00027     }
00028 
00029     template <typename T>
00030     inline _xmat3<T> transposeGTX(const _xmat3<T> & m)
00031     {
00032         _xmat3<T> Transpose;
00033         Transpose[0][0] = m[0][0];
00034         Transpose[0][1] = m[1][0];
00035         Transpose[0][2] = m[2][0];
00036 
00037         Transpose[1][0] = m[0][1];
00038         Transpose[1][1] = m[1][1];
00039         Transpose[1][2] = m[2][1];
00040 
00041         Transpose[2][0] = m[0][2];
00042         Transpose[2][1] = m[1][2];
00043         Transpose[2][2] = m[2][2];
00044         return Transpose;
00045     }
00046 
00047     template <typename T>
00048     inline _xmat4<T> transposeGTX(const _xmat4<T> & m)
00049     {
00050         _xmat4<T> Transpose;
00051         Transpose[0][0] = m[0][0];
00052         Transpose[0][1] = m[1][0];
00053         Transpose[0][2] = m[2][0];
00054         Transpose[0][3] = m[3][0];
00055 
00056         Transpose[1][0] = m[0][1];
00057         Transpose[1][1] = m[1][1];
00058         Transpose[1][2] = m[2][1];
00059         Transpose[1][3] = m[3][1];
00060 
00061         Transpose[2][0] = m[0][2];
00062         Transpose[2][1] = m[1][2];
00063         Transpose[2][2] = m[2][2];
00064         Transpose[2][3] = m[3][2];
00065 
00066         Transpose[3][0] = m[0][3];
00067         Transpose[3][1] = m[1][3];
00068         Transpose[3][2] = m[2][3];
00069         Transpose[3][3] = m[3][3];
00070         return Transpose;
00071     }
00072 }
